characters.name: Yasuho Hirose
characters.description:
__Height__: 166 cm (5'5")
__Occupation__: University Student
__Stand__: Paisley Park

A young girl who lives in the town of Morioh in the new timeline of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure. After the events of the March 11th earthquake she finds a mysterious naked man lying under rubble and decides to save him.

characters.name: Jousuke Higashikata
characters.description: Seemingly a sailor who is amnesiac about all details of his personal life.  For some reason, he has 4 testicles.  The real identity of this character is unknown. The second chapter stated that the Jojolion protagonist's name ~!could be Yoshikage Kira, however, it is later revealed that he is merely a doppelganger for the real Kira.!~ He was later given the name Jousuke by the Higashikata family, who took him in.   ~!However, DNA testing implies that they are nearly the same person.!~

characters.name: Joubin Higashikata
characters.description:
__Nationality__: Japanese

Jobin Higashikata is an antagonist featured in the eighth part of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, JoJolion. 

Jobin is the eccentric eldest son of the Higashikata Family. He is married with Mitsuba Higashikata and has a son, Tsurugi. Beyond his job at the Higashikata Fruit Company, Jobin was formerly one of the members of the Rock Humans' Locacaca Organization. 

Jobin desires the power of the Locacaca, wishing to obtain it to rid his family of the Higashikata curse. This desire leads to him valuing the Locacaca and elimination of any in his way above everything else, even being unconcerned if Morioh itself were to be destroyed in the process.

Jobin is a Stand User and wields the mysterious Speed King. Little is known about Speed King's abilities other than its primary ability to store heat and temperature within a short localized point. This power can be weaponized and used to heat people's blood vessels, boiling the blood inside to render them unconscious or even kill them- when applied to the temples the heat can become so damaging the victim's eyes burst. Speed King is shown to be physically able enough to rapidly pummel enemies. The Stand also has other hidden abilities that Jobin keeps undisclosed, even to his own family.

~!He is later killed after seeing the Wonder of U user, Tooru staring at him. He was struck with a calamity by being shot to death by the dip tube of a spray that pierced his chest and instantly suffered from extreme blood loss.!~

characters.name: Tsurugi Higashikata
characters.description: Tsurugi Higashikata, the youngest member of the Higashikata family, is the son of Jobin and Mitsuba Higashikata. Tsurugi's stand, Paper Moon King, allows him to transform objects into origami and create illusions.

characters.name: Rai Mamezuku
characters.description:
Rai Mamezuku is a reclusive plant appraiser secretly employed by the Higashikata Fruit Company. Rai is an eccentric, blunt, quick-witted, and analytical man who often comes across as cold-hearted. He is extremely antisocial, going to great lengths in order to stay isolated. His stand, Doggy Style, allows him to unravel his body into band-like cords.

~!He is struck by calamity after trying to attack Wonder of U, and as a result, is killed by Josuke's bubbles.!~

characters.name: Joushuu Higashikata
characters.description: Joshu is the spoiled third of Norisuke Higashikata IV's four children and eventually rubs shoulders with Josuke Higashikata without truly becoming a friend. He has an unrequited crush on Yasuho Hirose. Joshu eventually awakens a Stand, Nut King Call.

characters.name: Norisuke Higashikata IV
characters.description:
The current head of the Higashikata household and owner of the Higashikata Fruit Company. He is the father of Jobin, Hato, Joshuu, and Daiya Higashikata. 

~!His stand, King Nothing, can track specific smells.!~

characters.name: Daiya Higashikata
characters.description:
Daiya is Norisuke Higashikata's youngest daughter. She is near-blind, and is an avid fan of progressive rock (in particular, Yes). She is extremely possessive of Josuke, and appears to be jealous of Yasuho for getting close to him.

~!When she was a child, she fell into a fault near the wall-eyes and gained a stand, California King Bed, which can steal people's memories and turn them into chess pieces. A memory can be stolen when a person lies to Daiya or tries to fool her. However, stolen memories return if she steps on that person's shadow.!~

characters.name: Hato Higashikata
characters.description:
Hato is Norisuke Higashikata's eldest daughter. She's a model of some renown, and is quite proud of it. She gets into fights with Joshuu regularly.

~!Her stand, Walking Heart, allows her to lengthen her heels, turning them into deadly weapons.!~

characters.name: Kei Nijimura
characters.description:
Kei Nijimura is the Higashikata family's housekeeper. 

~!She is eventually revealed to be the daughter of Holy Joestar-Kira, making her Yoshikage Kira's younger sister. Kei is also a stand user who wields Born This Way, an automatic stand that produces freezing wind which activates when her target opens something.!~

characters.name: Holly Joestar-Kira
alt_names: 吉良・ホリー・ジョースター
characters.description: Holly Joestar-Kira is a world-renowned ophthalmologist at T.H. Medical University Hospital and associate professor at Morioh's T.G. University. She is the mother of Yoshikage Kira and Kei Nijimura. Holly suffers from a mysterious type of rock disease.

characters.name: Mitsuba Higashikata
characters.description:
Mitsuba is the wife of Jobin Higashikata and the mother of Tsurugi Higashikata.

~!Her stand, Awaking III Leaves, allows her to to use arrows to change the directions of energy and objects.!~

characters.name: Yoshikage Kira
characters.description:
Yoshikage Kira is a marine surgeon. He mostly acts cold and apathetic towards others, although he is not as heartless as he seems.

~!Yoshikage is Holy Joestar-Kira's son and Kei Nijimura's older brother. He underwent an equivalent exchange with Josefumi Kujo, fusing together to become Josuke Higashikata. He is also a stand user who wields Killer Queen.!~

characters.name: Josefumi Kuujou
characters.description:
~!__Stand__: Soft & Wet!~
__Nationality__: Japanese

Josefumi is a man of slim to medium build and seemingly average height. He is similar to Part 4's Josuke Higashikata in appearance, wearing metallic peace sign and heart pins on his clothes and styling his hair into a pompadour with the sides bleached. Josefumi wears a checker-patterned sweater over a loose-collared shirt with dark slacks.

(Source: JoJo's Bizarre Encyclopedia)

characters.name: Yotsuyu Yagiyama
characters.description:
Yagiyama is a man of slim build and average to above-average height, claiming to be 28 years old. He has shoulder-length, straight black hair with short bangs. His eyes are black with small triangular highlights.

He wears a headpiece of leaves and a collar with a pin bearing the letter H. His arms, stomach, and legs are clad in a dark, leathery material studded with small metallic spikes. Over this, he wears a crop top and a pair of floral-printed bloomers. Attached to his belt is a small pouch.

(Source: JoJo's Bizarre Encyclopedia)
